faqs.question: How do I create an account?
faqs.answer: To create an account, click 'Sign Up' on our homepage. Fill in your email, create a password, and verify your email address. You'll receive a confirmation email to activate your account.

faqs.question: I forgot my password, how can I reset it?
faqs.answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your email address, and we'll send you a password reset link. Follow the instructions in the email to create a new password.

faqs.question: How do I update my account information?
faqs.answer: Log into your account and go to 'Account Settings'. You can update your personal information, shipping addresses, and contact details there.

faqs.question: Can I change my email address?
faqs.answer: Yes, go to Account Settings and update your email address. You'll need to verify the new email before the change takes effect.

faqs.question: How do I delete my account?
faqs.answer: To delete your account, contact our customer service team. Please note that this action is permanent and cannot be undone.

faqs.question: Why can't I log into my account?
faqs.answer: Check that your email and password are correct. If you're still having trouble, try resetting your password or contact customer support.

faqs.question: How do I view my order history?
faqs.answer: Log into your account and click on 'Order History' to view all your past purchases, tracking information, and order details.

faqs.question: Can I have multiple shipping addresses?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can add and manage multiple shipping addresses in your Account Settings under 'Address Book'.

faqs.question: How do I change my notification preferences?
faqs.answer: Go to Account Settings and select 'Notifications' to customize your email and SMS preferences for orders, promotions, and updates.

faqs.question: What should I do if my account is locked?
faqs.answer: If your account is locked due to security reasons, contact customer support with your account details for assistance in unlocking it.

faqs.question: How can I update my phone number?
faqs.answer: Log into your account, go to Account Settings, and update your phone number in the contact information section.

faqs.question: Can I merge two accounts?
faqs.answer: Contact customer service to help merge accounts. Provide details for both accounts to ensure a smooth merge process.

faqs.question: How do I enable two-factor authentication?
faqs.answer: Go to Account Settings, select 'Security', and enable two-factor authentication for added account protection.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and bank transfers.

faqs.question: Is it safe to use my credit card on your website?
faqs.answer: Yes, we use SSL encryption and comply with PCI DSS standards to ensure your payment information is secure and protected.

faqs.question: Why was my payment declined?
faqs.answer: Payment can be declined due to insufficient funds, incorrect card details, or bank security measures. Contact your bank or try a different payment method.

faqs.question: Can I save my payment information for future purchases?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can securely save your payment methods in your account for faster checkout. We use encrypted storage for your security.

faqs.question: How do I remove a saved payment method?
faqs.answer: Go to Account Settings, select 'Payment Methods', and click 'Remove' next to the payment method you want to delete.

faqs.question: Do you offer payment plans or financing?
faqs.answer: We offer payment plans through select partners like Klarna and Afterpay for eligible purchases. Options appear at checkout.

faqs.question: When will I be charged for my order?
faqs.answer: Your payment method is charged when your order is confirmed and processed, typically within 24 hours of placing the order.

faqs.question: Can I split my payment between multiple cards?
faqs.answer: Currently, we don't support splitting payments between multiple cards. You can use one primary payment method per order.

faqs.question: How do I update my billing address?
faqs.answer: Go to Account Settings, select 'Payment Methods', and update the billing address associated with your payment method.

faqs.question: What should I do if I see an unauthorized charge?
faqs.answer: Contact customer service immediately if you see unauthorized charges. We'll investigate and help resolve any payment disputes.

faqs.question: Do you accept international payments?
faqs.answer: Yes, we accept international credit cards and PayPal. Additional fees may apply based on your bank and currency conversion.

faqs.question: How do I get a receipt for my purchase?
faqs.answer: Receipts are automatically emailed after purchase. You can also find them in your Account Order History section.

faqs.question: Can I change my payment method after placing an order?
faqs.answer: If your order hasn't been processed yet, contact customer service immediately to update your payment method.

faqs.question: Do you store my credit card information?
faqs.answer: We only store encrypted payment tokens, never actual credit card numbers. You can choose to save payment methods for convenience.

faqs.question: What currencies do you accept?
faqs.answer: We primarily accept USD, but also support EUR, GBP, CAD, and AUD. Currency options appear based on your location.

faqs.question: How do I search for products?
faqs.answer: Use the search bar at the top of the page. You can search by product name, brand, category, or keywords. Use filters to narrow down results.

faqs.question: How do I compare products?
faqs.answer: Select the 'Compare' option on product pages to add items to comparison. View detailed side-by-side comparisons of features and specifications.

faqs.question: Are product reviews authentic?
faqs.answer: Yes, we only allow verified purchase reviews. Customers must have bought the product to leave a review, ensuring authenticity.

faqs.question: How do I know if a product is in stock?
faqs.answer: Stock status is displayed on each product page. You can also set up notifications to be alerted when out-of-stock items become available.

faqs.question: Can I get product recommendations?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide personalized recommendations based on your browsing history, purchases, and similar customer preferences.

faqs.question: How do I find product specifications?
faqs.answer: Detailed specifications are available on each product page under the 'Specifications' tab, including dimensions, materials, and technical details.

faqs.question: Do you offer product warranties?
faqs.answer: Most products come with manufacturer warranties. Warranty information is listed on the product page and included with your purchase.

faqs.question: How do I check product availability in my area?
faqs.answer: Enter your zip code on the product page to check local availability and delivery options specific to your location.

faqs.question: Can I request a product that's not listed?
faqs.answer: Contact customer service with product details. We'll check if we can source it or add it to our catalog based on demand.

faqs.question: How do I save products for later?
faqs.answer: Click the 'Save for Later' or heart icon on any product to add it to your wishlist. Access saved items from your account.

faqs.question: Are there bulk pricing options?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer volume discounts for bulk orders. Contact our sales team for custom pricing on large quantity purchases.

faqs.question: How do I know about new product arrivals?
faqs.answer: Subscribe to our newsletter or follow our social media for new arrival notifications. You can also set up category alerts.

faqs.question: Do you offer product samples?
faqs.answer: Sample availability varies by product. Check the product page or contact customer service to inquire about samples for specific items.

faqs.question: How do I report a product quality issue?
faqs.answer: Contact customer service with your order number and details about the quality issue. We'll investigate and provide appropriate resolution.

faqs.question: Can I customize or personalize products?
faqs.answer: Some products offer customization options. Look for 'Customize' or 'Personalize' buttons on eligible product pages.

faqs.question: How do product ratings work?
faqs.answer: Products are rated 1-5 stars based on verified customer reviews. The overall rating reflects the average of all customer ratings.

faqs.question: Are there eco-friendly product options?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have a dedicated eco-friendly section. Look for the green leaf icon or filter by 'Sustainable' in product categories.

faqs.question: How do I check if products are compatible?
faqs.answer: Compatibility information is listed in product descriptions. Use our compatibility checker tool or contact support for specific questions.

faqs.question: Can I see products in different colors/sizes?
faqs.answer: Yes, select different options using the color/size dropdown menus on product pages to see variations and availability.

faqs.question: How do I return an item?
faqs.answer: Go to your Order History, select the item you want to return, and follow the return process. Print the prepaid return label and ship the item back.

faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: We accept returns within 30 days of delivery. Items must be unused, in original packaging, and in resalable condition.

faqs.question: Do I need to pay for return shipping?
faqs.answer: Return shipping is free for defective items or our errors. For other returns, a small return shipping fee may apply depending on the reason.

faqs.question: How long does it take to process a return?
faqs.answer: Returns are typically processed within 3-5 business days after we receive the item. You'll receive an email confirmation once processed.

faqs.question: Can I return items without original packaging?
faqs.answer: Items should be returned in original packaging when possible. Contact customer service for specific guidance on items without packaging.

faqs.question: What items cannot be returned?
faqs.answer: Personalized items, perishables, intimate apparel, and certain electronics cannot be returned for hygiene and safety reasons.

faqs.question: How do I track my return?
faqs.answer: Use the tracking number provided with your return label. You can also check return status in your Order History section.

faqs.question: Can I exchange an item instead of returning it?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can exchange items for different sizes or colors. Select 'Exchange' instead of 'Return' when initiating the return process.

faqs.question: What if I received the wrong item?
faqs.answer: Contact customer service immediately. We'll provide a prepaid return label and expedite shipping of the correct item at no charge.

faqs.question: How do I return a gift?
faqs.answer: Gift returns can be processed with the order number or gift receipt. The refund will be issued as store credit if no payment method is available.

faqs.question: Can I return sale items?
faqs.answer: Sale items can typically be returned following our standard return policy, unless marked as 'Final Sale' at the time of purchase.

faqs.question: What happens if I miss the return deadline?
faqs.answer: Contact customer service if you miss the 30-day deadline. We may make exceptions for special circumstances on a case-by-case basis.

faqs.question: How do I return multiple items from one order?
faqs.answer: You can return individual items or the entire order. Each item has its own return option in your Order History section.

faqs.question: Will I get a full refund for returned items?
faqs.answer: Yes, you'll receive a full refund for items returned in original condition within the return period, minus any return shipping fees if applicable.

faqs.question: Can I return items bought with a discount code?
faqs.answer: Yes, items purchased with discount codes can be returned. The refund amount will reflect the actual amount paid after the discount.

faqs.question: How do I return an item that was damaged during shipping?
faqs.answer: Contact customer service immediately with photos of the damage. We'll provide a prepaid return label and expedite a replacement.

faqs.question: What shipping options do you offer?
faqs.answer: We offer standard shipping (5-7 business days), expedited shipping (2-3 business days), and overnight shipping for most locations.

faqs.question: How much does shipping cost?
faqs.answer: Shipping costs vary by location and method. Standard shipping is free on orders over $50. See checkout for exact costs.

faqs.question: Do you ship internationally?
faqs.answer: Yes, we ship to over 100 countries. International shipping costs and delivery times vary by destination. Customs fees may apply.

faqs.question: How can I track my order?
faqs.answer: You'll receive a tracking number via email once your order ships. Use this number on our tracking page or the carrier's website.

faqs.question: Can I change my shipping address after ordering?
faqs.answer: Contact customer service immediately if you need to change your shipping address. Changes may not be possible if the order has already shipped.

faqs.question: What if I'm not home when my package arrives?
faqs.answer: Delivery attempts vary by carrier. You may receive a delivery notice with options to reschedule or pick up at a local facility.

faqs.question: Do you offer same-day delivery?
faqs.answer: Same-day delivery is available in select metropolitan areas for orders placed before 2 PM. Check availability at checkout.

faqs.question: How are shipping costs calculated?
faqs.answer: Shipping costs are based on package weight, dimensions, destination, and selected shipping speed. Exact costs are shown at checkout.

faqs.question: Can I ship to a PO Box?
faqs.answer: Yes, we can ship to PO Boxes using USPS. Some expedited services may not be available for PO Box addresses.

faqs.question: What packaging do you use?
faqs.answer: We use eco-friendly packaging materials and right-size boxes to minimize waste while ensuring your items arrive safely.

faqs.question: Can I schedule a specific delivery time?
faqs.answer: Delivery time scheduling depends on the carrier and location. Some premium shipping options offer delivery time windows.

faqs.question: What happens if my package is lost?
faqs.answer: Contact customer service if your package is lost. We'll investigate with the carrier and provide a replacement or refund as needed.

faqs.question: Do you ship to military addresses (APO/FPO)?
faqs.answer: Yes, we ship to APO/FPO addresses using USPS. Delivery times may be longer, and some restrictions may apply.

faqs.question: Can I pick up my order instead of having it shipped?
faqs.answer: Local pickup may be available depending on your location. Check for pickup options during checkout or contact customer service.

faqs.question: What if my package is damaged during shipping?
faqs.answer: Inspect packages upon delivery and report damage immediately. Contact customer service with photos for a quick replacement or refund.

faqs.question: How do I know what shipping method to choose?
faqs.answer: Consider your budget and urgency. Standard shipping is economical, expedited for faster delivery, and overnight for urgent needs.

faqs.question: Can I combine multiple orders for shipping?
faqs.answer: Orders placed separately cannot be combined for shipping. To avoid multiple shipments, add all items to your cart before checkout.

faqs.question: Do you provide shipping insurance?
faqs.answer: All shipments include basic coverage. Additional insurance is available for high-value items during checkout for extra protection.

faqs.question: What are your shipping cut-off times?
faqs.answer: Orders placed before 2 PM (EST) on business days typically ship the same day. Weekend and holiday orders ship the next business day.

faqs.question: Can I ship items as gifts?
faqs.answer: Yes, select 'This is a gift' during checkout to add gift wrapping and a personal message. The recipient won't see pricing information.

faqs.question: How do I contact customer service?
faqs.answer: You can reach customer service via live chat, email at support@aurora.com, or phone at 1-800-AURORA. We're available 24/7 to help.

faqs.question: What are your customer service hours?
faqs.answer: Our customer service team is available 24/7 through live chat and email. Phone support is available Monday-Friday 8 AM to 8 PM EST.

faqs.question: How do I subscribe to your newsletter?
faqs.answer: Enter your email in the newsletter signup at the bottom of our homepage or during checkout to receive exclusive offers and updates.

faqs.question: Can I use multiple discount codes on one order?
faqs.answer: Typically, only one discount code can be used per order. The system will automatically apply the best available discount for you.

faqs.question: How do I apply a gift card to my order?
faqs.answer: Enter your gift card code in the 'Gift Card' field during checkout. The balance will be applied to your order total.

faqs.question: Do you price match with competitors?
faqs.answer: We offer price matching on identical items from authorized retailers. Contact customer service with the competitor's price for verification.

faqs.question: How do I leave a product review?
faqs.answer: Go to the product page of items you've purchased and click 'Write a Review'. You must have purchased the item to leave a verified review.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my order?
faqs.answer: Orders can be cancelled if they haven't been processed yet. Contact customer service immediately to request cancellation.

faqs.question: How do I check my gift card balance?
faqs.answer: Enter your gift card number on our gift card balance page or call customer service to check your remaining balance.

faqs.question: Do you offer loyalty rewards?
faqs.answer: Yes, join our Aurora Rewards program to earn points on purchases, get exclusive offers, and enjoy member-only benefits.

faqs.question: How do I unsubscribe from emails?
faqs.answer: Click 'Unsubscribe' at the bottom of any marketing email, or manage your email preferences in your Account Settings.

faqs.question: What is your privacy policy?
faqs.answer: Our privacy policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information. You can find it linked at the bottom of our homepage.

faqs.question: Do you have a mobile app?
faqs.answer: Yes, download the Aurora app from the App Store or Google Play for convenient shopping, order tracking, and exclusive mobile offers.

faqs.question: How do I report a website issue?
faqs.answer: If you encounter technical issues on our website, please contact customer service with details about the problem and your browser information.

faqs.question: Can I place an order over the phone?
faqs.answer: Yes, our customer service team can help you place orders over the phone during business hours at 1-800-AURORA.

faqs.question: What payment methods are accepted for international orders?
faqs.answer: International orders can be paid with major credit cards and PayPal. Local payment methods may be available depending on your country.

faqs.question: How do I know if an item is on backorder?
faqs.answer: Backorder status is shown on the product page. You'll be notified of expected shipping dates for backordered items.

faqs.question: Can I modify my order after it's placed?
faqs.answer: Contact customer service immediately to modify your order. Changes may not be possible if the order is already being processed.

faqs.question: Do you offer installation services?
faqs.answer: Installation services are available for select products. Check the product page or contact customer service for installation options in your area.

faqs.question: How do I find products on sale?
faqs.answer: Visit our 'Sale' section or use the 'On Sale' filter when browsing categories to find discounted items and special offers.

faqs.question: What should I do if an item I want is out of stock?
faqs.answer: Click 'Notify Me' on the product page to receive an email alert when the item is back in stock. We'll notify you as soon as it's available.

faqs.question: Can I return an item after the 30-day period?
faqs.answer: Standard returns are within 30 days. Contact customer service for special circumstances - we may make exceptions on a case-by-case basis.

faqs.question: Do you offer expedited returns processing?
faqs.answer: Standard return processing is 3-5 business days. For urgent situations, contact customer service about expedited processing options.

faqs.question: Can I return items to a physical store?
faqs.answer: If you're near one of our physical locations, you may be able to return items in-store. Contact the store directly to confirm their return policy.

faqs.question: How do I print a return label?
faqs.answer: After initiating a return in your Order History, you'll receive an email with a prepaid return label to print and attach to your package.

faqs.question: What if the return label doesn't print correctly?
faqs.answer: Contact customer service if you have trouble printing your return label. We can email you a new label or provide alternative return instructions.

faqs.question: Do you ship on weekends?
faqs.answer: We process orders Monday through Friday. Weekend orders are processed on the next business day. Some carriers offer weekend delivery for expedited orders.

faqs.question: Can I ship different items to different addresses?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can specify different shipping addresses for items during checkout. Each address may have separate shipping charges.

faqs.question: What happens during shipping delays?
faqs.answer: We'll notify you of any significant shipping delays. You can also track your package for real-time updates on delivery status.

faqs.question: Do you use signature confirmation?
faqs.answer: Signature confirmation is used for high-value orders and can be requested for additional security. Check your shipping options at checkout.

faqs.question: Can I leave delivery instructions?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can add special delivery instructions during checkout. Note that following instructions depends on the carrier and delivery circumstances.

faqs.question: How long do you hold packages at pickup locations?
faqs.answer: Package hold times vary by carrier and location, typically 5-7 days. Check with the specific pickup location for their policy.

faqs.question: What if my shipping address doesn't exist in your system?
faqs.answer: If your address isn't recognized, try entering it differently or contact customer service. We can manually verify and add addresses as needed.

faqs.question: Do you offer white glove delivery?
faqs.answer: White glove delivery service is available for large items and furniture. This includes indoor delivery, unpacking, and assembly if needed.

faqs.question: Can I track multiple orders at once?
faqs.answer: Yes, your Order History page shows tracking information for all your orders. You can also set up tracking notifications for multiple packages.

faqs.question: What is the maximum package weight you ship?
faqs.answer: We can ship packages up to 150 lbs through standard carriers. Heavier items may require freight shipping with special arrangements.

faqs.question: How do I get a refund?
faqs.answer: Refunds are processed automatically when we receive and approve your returned item. Refunds typically appear in 5-7 business days.

faqs.question: Can I get store credit instead of a refund?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can choose store credit instead of a refund during the return process. Store credit never expires and can be used on future purchases.

faqs.question: What if I received a defective product?
faqs.answer: Contact customer service immediately with details about the defect. We'll provide a prepaid return label and expedite a replacement.

faqs.question: How do I check if my payment went through?
faqs.answer: You'll receive an order confirmation email if payment was successful. You can also check your Order History or contact customer service.

faqs.question: What happens if my payment fails during checkout?
faqs.answer: If payment fails, you'll be notified immediately. Try a different payment method or contact your bank if the issue persists.

faqs.question: Can I pay with cryptocurrency?
faqs.answer: Currently, we don't accept cryptocurrency payments. We accept credit cards, PayPal, and other traditional payment methods.

faqs.question: How do I dispute a charge?
faqs.answer: First, contact our customer service to resolve any billing issues. If needed, you can also dispute charges directly with your credit card company.

faqs.question: Can I set up automatic payments for subscriptions?
faqs.answer: Yes, subscription products can be set up with automatic payments. Manage your subscription settings in your account dashboard.

faqs.question: How do I add a new payment method?
faqs.answer: Go to Account Settings, select 'Payment Methods', and click 'Add New Payment Method' to securely add a credit card or other payment option.

faqs.question: What is your return policy for electronics?
faqs.answer: Electronics can be returned within 30 days if unopened, or 15 days if opened, in original condition with all accessories and packaging.

faqs.question: Do you test returned electronics?
faqs.answer: Yes, all returned electronics are tested for functionality and condition before being restocked or determining refund eligibility.

faqs.question: How do I set up product alerts?
faqs.answer: On any product page, click 'Set Alert' to receive notifications about price drops, back-in-stock alerts, or new product announcements.

faqs.question: Can I see a size chart for clothing items?
faqs.answer: Yes, clothing items have size charts available on the product page. Click 'Size Chart' or 'Sizing Guide' for detailed measurements.

faqs.question: How accurate are the product photos?
faqs.answer: Our product photos are professionally taken to accurately represent items. Colors may vary slightly depending on your device's display settings.

faqs.question: Do you offer virtual try-on or AR features?
faqs.answer: Select products offer augmented reality features. Look for the 'AR View' or 'Virtual Try-On' buttons on compatible product pages.

faqs.question: How do I find assembly instructions?
faqs.answer: Assembly instructions are included with products that require assembly. You can also find digital instructions on the product page or our support section.

faqs.question: Can I see what accessories are compatible with a product?
faqs.answer: Compatible accessories are listed on product pages under 'Accessories' or 'You May Also Need' sections.

faqs.question: How do I know if a product is environmentally friendly?
faqs.answer: Eco-friendly products are marked with green certification badges. Check the product description for environmental impact and sustainability information.

faqs.question: Do you offer product bundles or packages?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer curated bundles and product packages at discounted prices. Look for 'Bundle' options on product pages or browse our bundle section.

faqs.question: How do I find the newest products?
faqs.answer: Visit our 'New Arrivals' section or sort any category by 'Newest' to see the latest products we've added to our catalog.

faqs.question: Can I get expert advice on product selection?
faqs.answer: Yes, our product specialists are available via chat or phone to help you choose the right product for your needs and budget.

faqs.question: How do I care for my products?
faqs.answer: Care instructions are provided with products and available on product pages. Our customer service team can also provide specific care guidance.

faqs.question: Do you offer professional installation?
faqs.answer: Professional installation is available for select products. Check the product page or contact customer service to arrange installation in your area.

faqs.question: How do I join your affiliate program?
faqs.answer: Visit our affiliate program page to learn about partnership opportunities and apply to promote our products for commission.

faqs.question: Do you have a referral program?
faqs.answer: Yes, refer friends and earn rewards! Check your account dashboard for your unique referral link and current referral bonuses.

faqs.question: How do I provide feedback about your service?
faqs.answer: We value your feedback! Contact customer service, leave reviews, or use the feedback form on our website to share your experience.

faqs.question: Can I request a catalog?
faqs.answer: Digital catalogs are available for download on our website. Contact customer service if you prefer a printed catalog mailed to you.

faqs.question: How do I follow you on social media?
faqs.answer: Follow us on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and YouTube for the latest updates, product launches, and exclusive social media offers.

faqs.question: Do you have a student discount?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer student discounts with valid student ID verification. Sign up for our student program to access exclusive discounts.

faqs.question: How do I become a VIP member?
faqs.answer: VIP membership is earned through purchase history and loyalty. High-value customers are automatically invited to join our VIP program.

faqs.question: What benefits do VIP members get?
faqs.answer: VIP members enjoy early access to sales, exclusive products, free expedited shipping, and dedicated customer service support.

faqs.question: How do I update my communication preferences?
faqs.answer: Go to Account Settings and select 'Communication Preferences' to choose how and when you want to receive updates from us.

faqs.question: Can I schedule customer service calls?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can schedule a callback from customer service at a convenient time. Use the 'Schedule Call' option on our contact page.
